ticket.title: Stable CellIdV1 and HolonIdV1 genesis derivation

tickets.reason: Prerequisite per RFC-0020 ticket decomposition ordering

in_scope: Derive stable CellIdV1 and HolonIdV1 from genesis commitments
Guarantee operational key rotation does not rename identities

steps: Read the bound requirement(s) and this ticket scope; confirm no scope creep beyond out_of_scope list.
Implement: Implement CellGenesisV1 and HolonGenesisV1 artifacts
Implement: Derive stable CellIdV1 and HolonIdV1 from genesis commitments
Implement: Guarantee operational key rotation does not rename identities
Add/adjust unit/integration tests to cover acceptance criteria and regression risks per RFC-0020/07_test_and_evidence.yaml.
Capture evidence artifacts (logs, receipts, test outputs) and update the corresponding EVID-* artifact with concrete artifact pointers.

criteria: ID derivation deterministic and collision-resistant under declared hash profile
Genesis artifacts are hash-addressed in CAS

notes.security: Fail-closed, least privilege, and explicit authority proofs are mandatory.
notes.verification: Prefer deterministic tests, replay/CAS evidence, and bounded-resource checks; avoid process-local assumptions.
notes.general: Keep scope atomic to this ticket, preserve explicit dependency ordering, and avoid introducing semantic drift from RFC-0020.
